title: What class was affected the most during the Great Depression? - Quora

response.answer_text: There were essentially two classes most affected by the Great Depression were the independent farmer and blue collar workers. Here’s a short paper on the independent farm and how the sector was hit at the beginning of the 20th century, which accelerated during the Great Depression. http://generalspace.ggc.edu/generalspace/bitstream/10675.3/314546/1/Harris+African+American+Farms+in+Gwinnett+Paper.pdf Below is a paper on the Great Depression’s effect on blue collar workers.
